item.title: Playing Around with Kubernetes in EC2
item.description: The Minikube Cluster It is a local playground to learn or test your code as it would run on a full-fledged Kubernetes Cluster. It creates a small cluster consisting of only one node. The command minikube start launches the cluster with options for bare-metal, ssh, docker among others. The cluster can be managed with CLI but it also offers a GUI in the web browser, can be launched with minikube dashboard command.
